sectionText: Intro to Contemporary Dance, 3 hours. This online course will use Compass, and it satisfies the following 2 General Education Requirements in Humanities & the Arts: Literature & the Arts, and Cultural Studies: Western/Comparative Cultures. Overview of major works, figures, and trends responsible for shaping dance as an evolving contemporary art form. The course will have lectures, viewings, discussion and creative response components. For non-dance majors.
